Title: WOODBRIDGE B0931S Smart Bidet Toilet with 1.28 GPF Dual Flush Auto Open & Close, Foot Sensor Flush, Voice Control,1000 Gram Map Flushing Score, LED Display, Chair Height Design and Cleaning Foam Dispenser
Description: ✅ [VOICE CONTROL]: Toilet is equipped with voice control function. When user is close to the toilet and speaks wake words, it will respond and handle immediately. Faster and more convenient to use. You can turn on/off the function through remote control.

✅ [CHAIR HEIGHT DESIGN]: 17-3/8’’ height from floor to bowl, this smart toilet with considerate height design not only meets the ADA standards but also perfect for people with poor knees or difficulty getting up/down, bringing comfort and health.
✅ [AUTOMATIC FLUSH ]: When the auto flush function is turned on, it will automatically flush after detecting user departs from the seat, which is a hands-free operation.

✅ [MAP FLUSH 1000 GRAMS]: Dual Flushing -  1.6GPF/6L Full flush and 1.1GPF/4.1 L Half Flush, demonstrating the Best Maximum Performance Flush score of 1000 grams. Highly Recommended Map Scoring Toilet.
✅ [FRONT AND REAR WASH]: Rear washing/oscillating washing, front washing/oscillating washing, adjustable water pressure and hygienic filtered water offers you a refreshing experience.
✅ [MIRROR FINISH REMOTE CONTROL]: Elegant and stylish remote control with rear/front oscillating washing, air drying and automatic deodorization are all controlled by a smart wireless remote.

✅ [FOAM SHIELD & AUTO DEODORIZATION]: Offers a specially designed foam shield function, splash-proof and odor proof. Using powerful air lines, the deodorizer can effectively purify the air that helps mask odors.
✅ [FOOT SENSOR]: The toilet is equipped with a foot sensor to activate the opening and closing of the lid, opening and closing of the seat and the auto flush function.

✅ [CERTIFICATIONS & TECH SUPPORT]: WOODBRIDGE Bidet Toilet is certified to UL1431, CSA C22. Complies with IPC, UPC, NPC. IAPMO-EGS. Our professional support team is happy to provide assistance for any sales or product oriented inquiries.

Title: WOODBRIDGE B-0930S 1.6/1.1GPF Dual Flush Auto Open & Close Smart Toilet with Heated Bidet Seat, Intelligent Auto Flush, LED Temperature Display, Remote Control, Chair Height, Foot Sensor Flush and Build-In Booster Pump and Cleaning Foam Dispenser
Description: ✅ [SMART SENSING AUTO OPENING/CLOSING]: Toilet lid automatically opens and closes when one approaches or leaves, which meets the hands-free standard and is considered more hygienic compared to other toilets.

✅ [CHAIR HEIGHT DESIGN]: 17-3/8’’ height from floor to bowl, this smart toilet with considerate height design not only meets the ADA standards but also perfect for people with poor knees or difficulty getting up/down, bringing comfort and health.
✅ [AUTOMATIC FLUSH ]: When the auto flush function is turned on, it will automatically flush after detecting user departs from the seat, which is a hands-free operation.

✅ [HIGH EFFICIENCY FLUSH]: Dual Flushing -  1.6GPF/6L Full flush and 1.1GPF/4.1 L Half Flush, demonstrating a powerful yet flexible and easy flushing performance. Booster Pump will automatically turn on whenever there is low water pressure.
✅ [FRONT AND REAR WASH]: Rear washing/oscillating washing, front washing/oscillating washing, adjustable water pressure and hygienic filtered water offers you a refreshing experience.
✅ [MIRROR FINISH REMOTE CONTROL]: Elegant and stylish remote control with rear/front oscillating washing, air drying and automatic deodorization are all controlled by a smart wireless remote.

✅ [FOAM SHIELD & AUTO DEODORIZATION]: Offers a specially designed foam shield function, splash-proof and odor proof. Using powerful air lines, the deodorizer can effectively purify the air that helps mask odors.
✅ [FOOT SENSOR]: The toilet is equipped with a foot sensor to activate the opening and closing of the lid, opening and closing of the seat and the auto flush function.

✅ [CERTIFICATIONS & TECH SUPPORT]: WOODBRIDGE Bidet Toilet is certified to UL1431, CSA C22. Complies with IPC, UPC, NPC. IAPMO-EGS. Our professional support team is happy to provide assistance for any sales or product oriented inquiries.

Customer Reviews.Name: Sean Casler
Customer Reviews.Review Content: The packaging of the toilet is very tight and undamaged. Its automatic sensing function is really great, it's so intelligent, I really like it!

Title: WOODBRIDGE B0970S Smart Bidet Tankless Toilet Elongated One Piece Chair Height, Auto Flush, Foot Sensor Operation, Heated Seat with Integrated Multi Function Remote Control in White
Description: ✅ [ADA Compliant Toilet]:  Features 17.3" height from floor to seat. comfortable height seating, it makes visiting the toilet to be more comfort as there is less strain sitting on or standing up

✅ [HANDFREE FLUSH]:  Off-seat flushing, button flushing, foot sensing flushing and remote control flushing. Real hand free design and all these flushing operation will still able to operate by built-in battery power during power failure.

✅ [TANKLESS AND BOOSTER PUMP]: Spacious tankless design directly uses water from water pipe, and booster pump improves flush performance at low or inconsistent water pressure, operated on water pressure greater than 0.07 Mpa (dynamic) or 0.8 Mpa (static)
✅ [TOTALLY HYGIENIC]:  Self-cleaning bidet/spray wand, Posterior wash, Feminine wash, Pulsating wash, Adjustable water pressure, hygienic filtered water

✅ [AUTO DEODORIZATION]: Lightless catalyst generate catalytic reaction under lightless conditions, eliminate harmful air pollutants and convert pollutants into harmless water and carbon dioxide to achieve deodorization and air purification from source.
✅ [INSTANT WARMING COMFORT]: Special designed, contoured heated seat and powerful warm air dryer keep you warm and cozy early in the morning or throughout the winter seasons
✅ [HIGH EFFICIENCY DUAL FLUSH] Quiet and powerful Siphonic 1.6 GPF/1.0 GPF dual flushing with average 1.28GPF bringing a super-quiet and efficiency flush
✅ [INTELLIGENT NIGHT LIGHT] The glow of LED night light is perfect for kids, seniors or anyone who needs to use bathrppm in the middle of th night

✅ [CERTIFICATIONS & WARRANTY]: Compliance with IPC, IRC, UPC, NPC Code and ASME A112.4.2/CSA B45.16-2015 (R2020) Personal Hygiene Devices for Water Closet standard, 1 Year limited warranty to be free of defects from material and workmanship.

Technical Details.Included Components: Toilet, Bidet, Remote Control, Wax Ring, Installation Instruction

Customer Reviews.Name: Members choose anonymity
Customer Reviews.Review Content: Never have had a bidet, bought this and installed. This is simply the best toilet ever. The thought of going at work now will make me late for work for one more trip to this toilet, paper smearing is barbaric to me anymore. The auto open is awesome, the toilet screams "give me your poo" when it does this, the cleans you up, and before you have a chance to pull your pants up...whoosh it's already gone. I always liked a cool toilet seat, however the heated seat feels very nice and start automatically. Anyways, I hope this toilet functions for years to come because currently, it is awesome.

Customer Reviews.Name: Members choose anonymity
Customer Reviews.Review Content:
It is a sleek and modern style to match our bathroom remodel, and I like that it's a one-piece toilet. I never thought a toilet could be so attractive. I cannot praise enough about its smart features; it has all the bells and whistles you could ask for in a bidet.

My favorite feature is the seat warmer, and you can adjust the seat temperature (great for changing seasons). I also enjoy the automatic flush -- it makes me feel clean because I don't have to touch the toilet with my hands at all. 

So far, we have received lots of compliments from guests. Overall, I am pleased with my purchase.

Customer Reviews.Name: Members choose anonymity
Customer Reviews.Review Content: Love it!! Just installed mine yesterday (6/26/23) by myself. However, two people would have made the job easier. Anyways, I now feel like Randy from South Park when he gets rid of ol' blue and buys a Smart Toilet. If you haven't seen the episode watch it and he will persuade you even more to purchase this Smart Toilet. This one being (Model B0990S) in a steal in terms of the price with as many features as it offers. I bought one for my Master Bathroom and plan to buy another for my 2nd bathroom very soon. It does everything that Randy's from South Park does minus the Japanese music that the Toilet plays when the lid automatically opens in the episode. lol

Title: WOODBRIDGE  Intelligent Compact Elongated Dual-flush wall hung toilet with Bidet Wash Function, Heated Seat & Dryer. Matching Concealed Tank system and White Marble Stone Slim Flush Plates Included.LT611 + SWHT611+FP611-WH
Description: ✅ [All-In -ONE PACKAGE ]:  Package Includes wall hung soft closed smart toilet bidet, Wall Hung Toilet Concealed Tank system and rough in material, Mounting Hardware and Installation Manual.
✅ [COMFORT BIDET ] : Comfort bidet seat with hygiene wash, heated seat, hot air dryer, water heater, unlimited warm water, with oscillating and gentle massage pulse functions
✅ [CONCEALED DESIGN]: Water tank, carrier system, waterway connections, mounting hardware are totally concealed for clean and seamless look.
✅ [EASY MAINTENANCE ACCESS ]: Front panel with flush actuator plate for easy access to inner tank and valves, make repair and maintenance easier, no need to cut the wall to access.

✅ [DELUXE MARBLE STONE FLUSH PLATES]: White Marble Stone Slim Flush Plates are durable, resistant to mechanical damage, abrasion and scratches; not vulnerable to moisture and temperature changes; do not fade in case of frequent cleaning.  The Ultra-thin mounting and unique performance characteristics of the button provides high aesthetics and also helps to keep the toilet clean.
✅ [SAVE SPACE ]: Wall hung toilet saves up to 12" of space under the bowl, easy for bowl cleaning and floor cleaning.
✅ [DUAL FLUSH]: High performance dual flush gravity offers a choice of 0.8GPF for liquids or 1.6 GPF for solids waste.
✅ [DESIGN]: Design for finished walls up to 3.5" (9mm) thick, Frame heigh adjustable from 47" to 55", compatible with residential wall with 2x4 stud installation.

✅ [WARRANTY & AFTER SERVICE SUPPORT]: 1 year limited warranty to be free of defects from material and workmanship.  Our well trained customer service team is always here to help with any question or inquiry.

  deodorization and air purification from the source. It makes the air fresher

✅ [COMFORT DESIGN]: Comfort
  chair height design makes sitting down and standing up easier for most
  adults; Compact elongated bowl offers added comfort while occupying the same
  space as a round-front bowl

✅ [SKIRTED TRAP WAY]: Luxurious modern
  design one piece toilet, The skirted trap way creates a sleek look with no

✅ [QUITE & POWERFUL FLUSHING]: Best
  Maximum Performance Flush score of 1000 grams. High
  efficiency 1.28 GPF Siphon Jet flushing and fully glazed flush system offers

  & Canada CSA standard product, EPA Water Sense

✅

Customer Reviews.Name: William from CARSON,WA
Customer Reviews.Review Content: Let me start off by saying I hired a plumber to install it so I can't say much about the install other than I had to help him lower the toilet onto the bolts due to the weight (119lbs). If you are installing yourself you will need help lifting it onto the bolts. Also, install the t-adapter onto the back of the toilet along with the bidet seats hose and the line that will go to your water main before lowering the toilet onto the bolts... That being said I love the height of the toilet along with its apperance. As for the bidet seat it is the perfect pair for a perfect toilet
